captions.text:
- Well, son, are you ready
to open your present?

- Dad, you idiot,
I wanted an X-Bocks.

For within this pony
is the antidote.

Why, the antidote for the poison
that was in your birthday cake!

Now you get to choose
either to kill the pony

to retrieve the antidote,
or spare the pony

The clock is ticking,
birthday boy.

Well, it would seem that the
lesson was more valuable
